Man stands trial for Norway Pride gay bar shootingThe trial of the man accused of conducting a deadly rampage at a gay bar in Oslo in 2022 during the city's annual Pride celebrations is set to begin on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 01:05:04 GMT KSNAF5KKYJJ3LO7RPVJIVCQAVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/man-stands-Trial-norway-pride-gay-bar-shooting-2024-03-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Yemen's Houthis target 'US ship Pinocchio' in Red SeaYemen's Iran-aligned Houthis targeted what was described as the "U.S. ship Pinocchio" in the Red Sea, according to a speech of the group's military spokesman Yahya Sarea that was televised early on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 00:47:24 GMT JE5CWUI6NVMUTI72JCUXOVAYYY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemen-houthis-target-us-ship-pinocchio-red-sea-2024-03-12/Reuters世界中东地区
Moldova summons Russian ambassador over polling stationsMoldova's foreign ministry said on Monday it was summoning the Russian ambassador for an explanation of why Moscow was planning to open six polling stations in Moldova for this week's Russian presidential election instead of one as had been agreed. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 00:42:42 GMT Z5UFWJPWSVKFLMRUHGTUSSUWJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-summons- Russian-ambassador-over-polling-stations-2024-03-12/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Britain proposes location-based pricing for electricityBritain is proposing a location-based method to determine how much consumers should be charged for the electricity they use, the government said on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 00:03:19 GMT YVEW7DY5UFPD5OUFLT6N2N6HWU https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/britain-proposes-location-based-pricing-of-electricity-2024-03-12/Susanna Twidale世界英国
Brazil's Lula attributes interest rate level to cenbank chief's "stubbornness"Brazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said on Monday that there is no explanation for keeping the country's benchmark interest rate at the current 11.25% level apart from the "stubbornness" of central bank president Roberto Campos Neto. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 23:48:25 GMT 5K73IBV5LNJTHGQZYWYP3WUARM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazils-look-attributes-key-interest-rate-1125-cenbank-chiefs-stubbornness-2024-03-11/Reuters世界美洲
Russia says broker will take bids from March 25 for frozen assets swapRussians who own frozen foreign securities will be able to apply from March 25 to sell them to foreigners with frozen assets in Russia, the Russian finance ministry said on Monday, a plan some investors and regulators said would run afoul of Western sanctions. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 23:45:13 GMT QB7R2DQXN5M4LC646KZUD2D3T4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-broker-will-take-bids-for-march-25-frozen-assets-swap-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
German court to rule on 'extremist' label for AfDA German court is due to rule this week on whether security services can treat the far-right Alternative for Germany and its youth wing as suspected extremist organisations, a decision that could cost the party dearly in upcoming European elections. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 23:03:28 GMT JBOMMHJNWZO7XPAY34G2ZWWOPM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/german-court-rule-extremist-label-afd-2024-03-11/Thomas Escritt世界欧洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy says frontline situation better than in prior three monthsPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Monday that the situation along the front of Ukraine's war with Russia was the best it had been in three months, with Moscow's troops no longer advancing after their capture last month of the eastern city of Avdiivka. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 22:36:39 GMT J6Y5IGPVZZKBHAMVGCWAQHNC3U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-zelenskiy-says-frontline-situation-better-than-prior-third-months-2024-03-11/Reuters世界欧洲
North Korean delegation meets Mongolian President in rare visit -KCNANorth Korea's Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Myong Ho met with Mongolian President Ukhnaagiin Khurelsukh on Monday, North Korean state media KCNA said, in a rare foreign trip by a diplomatic delegation from the isolated state. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 22:14:47 GMT N3VKPB5QBJMXXC3QJL2HQFB4H4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korean-delegation-meets-mongolian-president-rare-visit-kcna-2024-03-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Israel urges UN Security Council to pressure Hamas on hostagesIsrael's Foreign Minister Israel Katz on Monday demanded the United Nations Security Council "put as much pressure as possible" on Palestinian militants Hamas to release the people it took hostage during the Oct. 7 attack on Israel. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 22:04:41 GMT YU52OGHYSVMGDIBUYYOX2GG5PY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-urges-un-security-council-Pressure-hamas-hostages-2024-03-11/Michelle Nichols世界中东地区
US-British forces strike Houthi targets, killing 11, Yemen government saysAirstrikes attributed to a U.S.-British coalition hit port cities and small towns in western Yemen on Monday, killing at least 11 people and injuring 14 while defending commercial shipping, a spokesperson for Yemen's internationally recognized government told Reuters. Mon, 11 Mar 2024 20:24:29 GMT 2BBGI44VSVOPRICETBTJBW7A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-british-forces-strike-houthi-targets-yemen-houthi-outlet-says-2024-03-11/Mohammed Ghobari世界中东地区
